item.title: Audi Italy Boss Fabrizio Longo Dies After Falling From 10,000-Foot Mountain
item.description: Mr Longo, who headed Audi's Italy-based operations, was nearing the summit when the accident occurred.

item.title: Cathay Pacific says 15 jets need new part after Rolls-Royce engine problem
item.description:
Airline cancelled flights after component failure on Airbus A350 aircraft after take-off on Monday

  • Business live â€“ latest updates

Cathay Pacific Airways said it had identified 15 Airbus A350 aircraft that needed component replacements after a part failed on one of its Rolls-Royce engines minutes after take-off from Hong Kong on Monday.

The airline said it expected to cancel 34 return flights through to Wednesday, when it would also provide details of any further service cuts for the rest of the week.

Continue reading...
